column4: I like Monet and I don't care if you judge me.  There are several Monet paintings here and each gives me pause.  People might throw out the Cher's line from Clueless (So Monet
column6: but up close it's a big ol' mess)
column7: but Monet is MEANT to be looked at from a distance.   The water lilies
column10: landscapes.  All are spectacular to me.
